author: Lucy Khayat
title: Cyber Security Strategic Partnership Asia-Pacific
text:
Today Dragonfly Technologies Pty Ltd (Dragonfly) are pleased to announce a strategic partnership with Singapore based NSHC (Singapore) Pte Ltd (NSHC). The partnership will drive collaboration in the Asia-Pacific region between the two firms Dragonfly and NSHC.
“Our partnership with NSHC is a collaboration that will span several countries and includes Australia, Singapore, South Korea and Japan. Our partnership provides a single channel in the fight against cyber-crime for the local Australian market.” CEO Branko Ninkovic - Dragonfly.
The partnership will provide cyber security services in the areas of PCI DSS, Threat Intelligence, Penetration Testing and Application Security Services, Training and Awareness for Law Enforcement Agencies and Security Research.
“The key to fight cyber-crime across the Asia-Pacific region is through collaboration and NSHC is pleased to have formed the strategic partnership” CEO Louis Hur - NSHC
“Our collaboration with Dragonfly will bolster our research to be the leader in advanced offensive cyber warfare research. Our cyber capabilities in security intelligence from malicious attackers and our strategic partnership we aim to be the leaders in the detection and response to new arising threats and zero-day and vulnerabilities. It is an important time and we must act accordingly to protect, detect and respond.” Jaekee Min, Vice-President, Global Business, NSHC
About Dragonfly
Dragonfly Technologies Pty Ltd was established in 2005 with the launch of fireflyMobile and has since grown to become a trusted name in information security and networking services to Australia’s top organisations and government agencies.
Dragonfly’s customers are medium-to-large organisations from a range of industries and sectors that include government, banking and finance, telecommunications, healthcare, retail and entertainment.
Over the years, the Dragonfly team has helped our customer's improve their security posture, reduce risk, and connect through leading edge and innovative technologies.
Web Site: http://www.dragonflytechnologies.com.au
About NSHC
NSHC was founded in 2004 and is based in Singapore and South Korea. NSHC is a trusted and leader in cyber-security defenses, training and advanced cyber response capabilities.
NSHC holds top 5 positions in several worldwide hacking contests and has been invited as a distinguished speaker at international information security conference that include Black Hat, HITCON, ISEC & DEFCON.
Web Site: http://www.nshc.net
About Branko Ninkovic - Dragonfly Chief Executive Officer
Branko is the principal consultant and key driver in the growth and development of Firefly products and security services.
Branko has a background in security and software development and holds over 20 years experience in a broad range of IT Management roles and projects. Prior to founding Dragonfly, Branko held both state and senior national management roles across a range of IT disciplines including change management, risk and release management and project management for ASX 100 companies including Macquarie Bank and Brambles Australia.
About Louis Hur - NSHC Chief Executive Officer
Louis is the founder and well renowned security researcher, international speaker and respected author for over 15 years.
Louis founded NHSC in 2004, the “Network Security Hacking Club” while in college with friends and today NSHC has grown to be a leader in cyber-security defenses, training and advanced cyber response capabilities across Asia.
Louis is the author of "iOS Forensic Analysis."
For all media inquires please contact Lucy Khayat (lkhayat@dragonflytechnologies.com.au)
